it.polimi.se2019.Model

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.Model.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the map of the game, i.e the arena where the champions fight. A map is an object composed by various rooms; every room is made of squares, the single cells where the players can be.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Map(java.lang.Integer mapID, Room greenRoom, Room redRoom, Room yellowRoom, Room whiteRoom, Room purpleRoom, Room blueRoom)
      ---------------------- CONSTRUCTOR Instead of using setters, there is a custom constructor for the Map objects that assigns the various rooms.
